Mose Se Sengo (“Fan Fan”) (16 Ọktoba 1945 - 3 Mee 2019) bụ onye na-egwu egwu, onye na-ede egwu na onye isi otu egwu si Democratic Republic of Congo
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ nke Congolese Soukous
A mụrụ Mose Se Sengo, na Kinshasa nke ugbu a, Democratic Republic of the Congo, n'ụbọchị 16 Ọktoba n'afọ 1945
Ọ malitere ịkpọ ụbọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi na Kinanga.
Ya na Franco na TPOK Jazz gbara egwu, nke ọ sonyeere n'afọ 1968
O mechara sonye na otu egwu Lovy du Zaire, nke Victor "Vicky" Longomba guzobere n'afọ 1971 ma ọ bụ n'afọ 1972, onye bụbu onye guzobere OK Jazz ma mesịa bụrụ onye otu African Jazz

Ndị egwu ndị ọzọ a ma ama na Lovy du Zaire gụnyere Bumba Massa, Youlou Mabiala na Syran Mbenza Dị ka otu isi iyi si kwuo, Otú ọ dị, ọ "enweghị ike ịnagide ihu abụọ nke onye ndu ahụ ma kwụsị n'oge na-adịghị anya."

N'afọ 1974, o si Zaire gaa East Africa, buru ụzọ biri na Tanzania ruo ọtụtụ afọ. Na ngwụsị afọ ndị 1970, o guzobere nsụgharị ọhụrụ nke ndị otu ya Somo Somo, nke a sụgharịrị dịka Double Trouble, na-eme n'asụsụ Lingala
Ndị otu a rụrụ na Tanzania, Zambia na Kenya
Ná mmalite afọ 1980, ọ kwagara Kenya, ebe ọ rụgharịrị Somo Somo ma dekọọ ọtụtụ abọm. N'afọ 1983 "Fan Fan" rutere London, England na-agwakọta egwu ya na ndị egwu jazz Bekee.
N'afọ ndị 1990, ọ sonyeere Bana OK, otu egwu egwu maka Franco Luambo Makiadi nke TPOK Jazz
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2000 ruo ugbu a "Fan Fan" alaghachila na mgbọrọgwụ nke ụdị Acoustic Rumba
Ka ọ na-erule mmalite afọ 2010, ọ bi na London ma nweta nwa amaala Britain mgbe ọ nwụrụ.
Na 3 Mee 2019, Mose Se Sengo nọ na njem ndekọ na Nairobi, Kenya, mgbe ọ dara ma nwụọ n'ihi nkụchi obi a na-enyo enyo
Fan Fan, onye nọ n'otu ụlọ dị na Thika Superhighway, e bugara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ Kasarani dị na Nairobi, ebe e kwuru na ọ nwụrụ mgbe ọ bịarutere.
Onye na-emepụta egwu ahụ, Tabu Osusa, kwuru na Fan Fan nọ n'obodo ahụ na-edekọ egwu ọhụrụ ya na ndị na-eti egwu na Nairobi gụnyere Paddy Makani na Disco Longwa

Mose Fan Fan, onye ebe obibi ya dị na London, hụrụ Nairobi n'anya ma na-eleta Kenya mgbe niile kemgbe afọ 2016. Ọnwụ ya bịara otu ụbọchị tupu e lie onye egwu Congo ọzọ nke oge ya, Lutumba SImaro, onye ha na ya gbara egwu na TPOK Jazz band. Atụmatụ na-aga n'ihu, site n'ụbọchị 11 Mee 2019, iji weghachite ozu ya na mba United Kingdom maka olili ikpeazụ.
